headline: Mexico's Banorte once again weighs Banamex purchase
summary: MEXICO CITY (Reuters) -Mexican lender Banorte will again consider a potential purchase of Banamex, Citi's one-time retail unit in the country which it split off last year, Banorte's CEO told analysts on Wednesday.  "There are a lot of moving pieces," CEO Marcos Ramirez said.  Banorte had previously bowed out of the competition for Banamex in 2022, though Citi was ultimately unable to find a buyer for the unit.
